author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning from Hong Kong, where we are wrapping up our D.Live Asia conference on all things tech. With tensions rising between the U.S. and China over issues such as intellectual property and technology transfer, it’s been a fascinating series of discussions. Check out the key interviews here.
Notes on a Scandal
The intrigue in Washington shows no sign of letting up soon. Stepping up his efforts to bring Robert Mueller’s investigation to a conclusion, President Trump hired longtime ally and former New York City Mayor Rudy...
